messages.title: Please help by acting now to save Otago Lane
messages.content: In the coming weeks, Glasgow's Labour City Council will decide whether to give the go ahead for a massive development of luxury flats at Otago Lane, seriously overdeveloping the area and threatening wildlife, local residents' tranquility, businesses, architecture, and the traditional character of the area.

messages.title: It's a two horse race
messages.content: Only Katy Gordon and the Lib Dems can beat Labour in Glasgow North.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Objecting to the development of luxury flats in Otago Lane to preserve local wildlife, residents' tranquility, businesses, and the traditional character of the area.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Katy Gordon and the Lib Dems can beat Labour in Glasgow North.

issues.environment: Preventing overdevelopment in Otago Lane to protect the local environment.

housing.content: Objecting to the development of luxury flats in Otago Lane.
